main.name: Daniel SH Ryu
main.description: Born in Busan, raised in Shanghai, and venturing out into the startup scene in St. Louis

education.school: Washington University in St. Louis | McKelvey School of Engineering
education.degree: BSc and MEng in Computer Science
education.description: GPA: 3.9/4.0, Member of Tau Beta Pi Engineering Honor Society, took relevant courseworks including Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Object-Oriented Software Development, Parallel and Concurrent Programming, Mobile App Development, Data Structures and Algorithms, Rapid Development and Creative Programming

points: Revamped the backend by migrating microservices to Go and implementing parallelization, resulting in a 20% improvement in response time, reduced container image sizes, and enhanced concurrency.

Implemented an email parsing AI tool using Python, Django Celery Beat and the OpenAI Chat Completion API, automating the extraction and translation of trip confirmation emails into application-compatible objects, improving user satisfaction.
Implemented a cache system using Redis, significantly enhancing search response times.

Improved the server application by integrating a distributed system using TypeScript and Node.js, achieving a 30% reduction in API latency, leading to faster geospatial data processing and retrieval from 30+ third-party API services.
Streamlined data ingestion from multiple API services to Elasticsearch with Python and ArgoWorkflow, enhancing data accuracy and search efficiency.

Mentored a cohort of 20 students for a Software Development course encompassing web application development in client-side and server-side Javascript, SQL, PHP, database management, building Apache web server, utilizing web frameworks, and more.

work.company: Washington University School of Medicine in St. Louis
work.title: Research Software Engineer

points: Developed an IoT-based patient monitoring system using React.js, Swift, Java and AWS cloud services, tracking over 100 subjects and contributing to a notable enhancement in patient monitoring and outcome analysis.
Optimized AWS Lambda functions and integrated AWS Kinesis for patient data streaming, achieving an 80ms reduction in latency and significantly enhancing real-time data analysis capabilities.
Launched a new employee onboarding feature for open-source HR software, reducing onboarding time by 30% and improving the experience for HR managers and new hires.
Implemented bidirectional RESTful APIs for onboarding progress tracking, ensuring accurate and timely data synchronization between the client and PostgreSQL database.
Founded a Web3 brand and spearheaded a group of developers and designers in creating an NFT collection.
Orchestrated a marketplace dApp and deployed smart contract and NFT tokens on the Polygon network using Solidity, OpenZeppelin, and Typescript.
Created an NFT collection website with React.js and deployed the website using AWS EC2 Instance.
Developed Web and Instagram scraping tools using Python, Selenium WebDriver, and BeautifulSoup library to collect and analyze target market data and online customer behaviors.

Developed an AI-powered browser extension app using Typescript, Node.js, and OpenAI Chat Completions API, which captures and organizes travel destination data encountered by users during browsing sessions automatically, enhancing travel planning.
Crafted an iOS/Android mobile app for an anonymous social platform for college students using React Native, and Firestore.
Implemented user and post-channel privacy security features, contributing to a more secure user experience.
Engineered an iOS social media app that provides a collection of Augmented Reality effects and games using ARKit and RealityKit SDK.
Reworked application logic and synchronized data to reduce CPU utilization, reducing main thread work time by 10%
Created an iOS app that hosts an interactive multiplayer tag game using Swift, MapKit, and Ruby.
Managed game data with Realtime Firebase DB, and scaled the application to hold up to over 100+ players.
